template_input_params.name: region
template_input_params.label: Region
template_input_params.description: AWS region to deploy your OpenShift cluster nodes. The AWS selected region should have at least 3 availability zones.

template_input_params.name: availability_zones
template_input_params.label: Availability Zones
template_input_params.description: The availability zone letter identifier in the above selected region. True high availability should have at least 3 availability zones.

template_input_params.name: key_pair_name
template_input_params.label: Key Pair Name
template_input_params.description: Name of the EC2 key pair.

template_input_params.name: key_pair_private_key
template_input_params.label: Key Pair Private Key
template_input_params.description: Base64 encoded private key file contents of the EC2 key pair.
template_input_params.regexdesc: Enter a valid base64 encoded text. Base64 encoded text contains alphanumeric characters and equals symbol as padding.

template_input_params.name: s3_bucket
template_input_params.label: S3 Bucket
template_input_params.description: The s3 bucket name that will store the ignition files required for OpenShift cluster nodes.

template_input_params.name: redhat_pull_secret
template_input_params.label: Redhat Pull Secret (base64 encoded)
template_input_params.description: Base64 encoded Redhat Pull Secret. Used to pull OpenShift related install files.
template_input_params.regexdesc: Enter a valid base64 encoded text. Base64 encoded text contains alphanumeric characters and equals symbol as padding.

template_input_params.name: cluster_name
template_input_params.label: Cluster Name
template_input_params.description: OpenShift cluster prefix. Used to prefix a randon string used to name and tag VPC and other AWS resources created for OpenShift nodes.
template_input_params.regexdesc: Cluster name can have lower case alphabets, numbers and dash. Must start with lower case alphabet and end with alpha-numeric character. Maximum length is 10 characters.

template_input_params.name: domain_name
template_input_params.label: Public Domain Name
template_input_params.description: The domain entered must be in the Route53 public hosted zone.

template_input_params.name: vpc_cidr
template_input_params.label: VPC CIDR
template_input_params.description: The CIDR block for the VPC

template_input_params.name: public_subnet_cidrs
template_input_params.label: Public Subnet CIDRs
template_input_params.description: Used for the bastion, bootstrap nodes and the public facing load balancers. You must provide one for each availability zone.

template_input_params.name: private_subnet_cidrs
template_input_params.label: Private Subnet CIDRs
template_input_params.description: Used for the OPC cluster nodes, and private load balancers. You must provide one for each availability zone.

template_input_params.name: bastion_node_count
template_input_params.label: Create a New or Destroy the Existing Bastion
template_input_params.description: Create or destroy bastion for the OpenShift install.  Required for installation. Can be removed after if no longer required after successful installation.

template_input_params.name: bastion_instance_type
template_input_params.label: Instance Type
template_input_params.description: List of Recommended Instance types.

template_input_params.name: bastion_volume_size
template_input_params.label: Disk Size (GiB)
template_input_params.description: Enter size of root disk in gibibytes

template_input_params.name: bootstrap_node_count
template_input_params.label: Create a New or Destroy the Existing Bootstrap
template_input_params.description: Create or destroy bootstrap for the OpenShift install.  Required for installation.  Should be removed after successful installion.

template_input_params.name: bootstrap_instance_type
template_input_params.label: Instance Type
template_input_params.description: List of Recommended Instance types.

template_input_params.name: bootstrap_volume_size
template_input_params.label: Disk Size (GiB)
template_input_params.description: Enter size of root disk in gibibytes.

template_input_params.name: master_node_count
template_input_params.label: Number of Master Nodes
template_input_params.description: Create Master Nodes (minimum of 3 required).
template_input_params.regexdesc: Enter a valid number of master nodes - between 3 and 100.

template_input_params.name: master_instance_type
template_input_params.label: Recommended Instance Type
template_input_params.description: List of Recommended Instance types.

template_input_params.name: master_volume_size
template_input_params.label: Disk Size (GiB)
template_input_params.description: Enter size of root disk in gibibytes.

template_input_params.name: worker_node_count
template_input_params.label: Number of Worker Nodes
template_input_params.description: Create Worker Nodes (minimum of 2 required).
template_input_params.regexdesc: Enter a valid number of worker nodes - between 2 and 100.

template_input_params.name: worker_instance_type
template_input_params.label: Recommended Instance Type
template_input_params.description: List of Recommended Instance types.
template_input_params.regexdesc: Enter a valid number of master nodes - between 2 and 100.

template_input_params.name: worker_volume_size
template_input_params.label: Disk Size (GiB)
template_input_params.description: Enter size of root disk in gibibytes

template_output_params.name: cluster_name
template_output_params.label: OpenShift Cluster Name
template_output_params.description: Generated OpenShift Cluster Name (Provided cluster name with a random character string attached).

template_output_params.name: ocp_web_console
template_output_params.label: OpenShift Web Console
template_output_params.description: URL that can be logged into using the install provided user and password.

template_output_params.name: admin_user
template_output_params.label: Admin User
template_output_params.description: Default user to log into the OpenShift web-console.

template_output_params.name: admin_password
template_output_params.label: Admin Password
template_output_params.description: Default password for the kubeadmin user.

template_output_params.name: kubeconfig
template_output_params.label: kubeconfig
template_output_params.description: To access the cluster as the system:admin user when using 'oc', Save the kubeconfig output to a file, then run 'export KUBECONFIG=<kubeconfig_file>
